episode_summary: This episode features facts about the inventor of Pringles being buried in a Pringles can, the world's first IVF clinic in Bourne, the sole mustard maker in Dijon, and W.B. Yeats having a vasectomy to cure writer's block. The hosts explore these topics with humor and interesting anecdotes.

facts.fact: The man who invented Pringles was buried in a Pringles can.
The world's first IVF clinic was opened in a town called Bourne.
There is only one guy in Dijon who makes mustard.
The poet W.B. Yates once had a vasectomy to cure his writer's block.
